channels.summary: Discussion on how to handle SEO clients when you're uncertain about delivering results, plus a shared article on using cosine similarity to optimize for AI Overview appearances.

highlights.title: Article on cosine similarity in SEO for AI Overview visibility
highlights.details: Shared guide on how cosine similarity can be used to align content with AI-generated search overviews, helping improve chances of showing up in AI Overview results.

highlights.title: Handling SEO clients when unsure about results
highlights.details: Members discuss approaches to closing SEO deals when they're not fully confident about outcomesâ€”ranging from being transparent and collaborating on strategy to referring clients elsewhere rather than overpromising.

channels.summary: Invite to a session sharing a tested playbook for boosting brand visibility in AI-generated results, with mention of how Spotlight can automate the workflow, plus light banter and brief sitemap mention.

highlights.title: GEO visibility playbook & Spotlight automation session
highlights.details: Announcement of a session sharing a proven playbook to grow a brand from 0% to 20% visibility in 2 weeks, based on millions of prompt responses across 1000+ brands, using free tools and Spotlight for automation.

channels.summary: Loose discussion about AI tools and theory, including an offer of Azure credits, a recommendation to join EleutherAI, and conversation around complex theoretical frameworks used to describe an AI-related algorithm.

highlights.title: Offer of $5k in Azure credits
highlights.details: Member offers access to $5,000 in Microsoft Azure credits that expire on Feb 24, inviting others to use them for AI or infrastructure experiments.

highlights.title: Recommendation to join EleutherAI Discord
highlights.details: Suggestion for a member to seek peers and feedback in the EleutherAI Discord community, indicating it as a good place for people working on advanced AI and related research.
